comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST5B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEST5B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST5B model. The Type ST5B excitation system is a variation of the Type ST1A model, with alternative overexcitation and underexcitation inputs and additional limits.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 7.5.   Note: the block diagram in the IEEE 421.5 standard has input signal Vc and does not indicate the summation point with Vref. The implementation of the ExcIEEEST5B shall consider summation point with Vref.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier regulation factor (K).  Typical Value = 0.004. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kr
contents.comment: Regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 200. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Firing circuit time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.004. Default: 0

contents.name: tb1
contents.comment: Regulator lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 6. Default: 0

contents.name: tb2
contents.comment: Regulator lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

contents.name: tc1
contents.comment: Regulator lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0

contents.name: tc2
contents.comment: Regulator lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

contents.name: tob1
contents.comment: OEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: tob2
contents.comment: OEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

contents.name: toc1
contents.comment: OEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: toc2
contents.comment: OEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

contents.name: tub1
contents.comment: UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: tub2
contents.comment: UEL lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: tuc1
contents.comment: UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 2. Default: 0

contents.name: tuc2
contents.comment: UEL lead time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
